summary: The back story is a marvelous and gorgeous social commentary on the type of generous actions we could all take - to enrich our often-solitary elder-citizens' lives.
cast: Albert Dupontel|Marie-Josée Croze|Pierre Vaneck|Cristiana Réali|Mathias Mlekuz|Claire Nebout|François Marthouret|Anne Loiret|José Paul|Daphné Bürki|Samuel Labarthe|Jean Dell|Guillaume de Tonquédec|Xavier Gallais|Stéphan Wojtowicz|Marie-Christine Adam|Niall Mac Eachmharcaigh|Annick Alane|Thierry Liagre|Marine Laporte|Titouan Laporte|Mario Pecqueur|Alessandra Martines|Jesse Morris
title: Dejad de quererme
